sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from "react-leaflet"; import axios from "axios"; import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css"; import L from "leaflet"; import { MapPinIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, ShieldCheckIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; // Fix for default marker icons in Leaflet with React delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl; L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({ iconRetinaUrl: "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon-2x.png", iconUrl: "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-icon.png", shadowUrl: "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/leaflet/1.7.1/images/marker-shadow.png", }); export default function CrimeMap() { const [reports, setReports] = useState([]); const [filter, setFilter] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/crime").then((res) => setReports(res.data)); }, []); const filteredReports = filter ? reports.filter((r) => r.crimeType === filter) : reports; return (

Crime Map

{filteredReports.map((report) => (
{report.crimeType}

{report.description}

{new Date(report.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

 ))}

Legend

High Risk
Medium Risk
Low Risk

Safety Tips

  • Avoid isolated areas after dark
  • Keep valuables secure and out of sight
  • Stay in well-lit areas
  • Be aware of your surroundings
  • Report suspicious activities immediately

Reported Incidents

    {filteredReports.map((report) => (
  • {report.crimeType} {report.description} {new Date(report.timestamp).toLocaleString()} | Lat: {report.latitude}, Lng: {report.longitude}
    • ))}
); }
